jobDescription: Overview  Altice USA (NYSE: ATUS) is one of the largest broadband communications and video services providers in the United States, delivering broadband, pay television, telephony services, proprietary content and advertising services to approximately 4.9 million Residential and Business customers across 21 states through its Optimum and Suddenlink brands.  From high-speed broadband and ultra-HD video, to digital advertising solutions, local news and voice offerings, we are making connections possible around the country -- to businesses, to consumers, to communities, to schools, to hospitals, and everyone in between. Responsibilities The Sr. Data Analyst acts as a point of contact between the Business Intelligence (BI) group and other functional groups within the company fully engaged in requirements gathering, preparing related documentation, user acceptance testing, data troubleshooting, and Excel ad hoc reporting.  The position will determine and address the BI plans, projects, and responsibilities to meet the goals and tactics of Operations functions or associated Business Planning. It will directly oversee, guide and coordinate Programmer Analysts and outside consultants, as well as have significant daily interaction with all levels of functional personnel served by BI (Consumer Operations, Product Management and Marketing, Sales). It supports the Key Operating Metrics System (KOMS) through application and report enhancement.  This role will require excellent analysis and understanding of BI reporting and business analysis as this team works very closely with our department's internal team to develop consolidated reporting packages, trend analysis and customer insights. Candidate must be able to communicate to both technical and non-technical team members as well with all levels of the organization.  This person will ensure compliance with all Company policies and Customer requirements.
